jd_information.description: Job duties: -Research, write and edit content from scratch for website, social media, newsletters, Company brochures, client communications, clients’ CV/resume, reference letter, legal documents and articles.-Write web content based on material supplied by client or employer.-Proofread final draft of web pages.-Write content for Meta keyword and description tags.-Write alt-text for images.
